channel.title: My compiler won't work need help!
channel.description:
I just made a command in my server but it wont let me compile it. When I compile i get: _________________________________________ javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
_________________________________________
The code for the compiler im using is this.
@echo off title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp]http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp[/url] :end echo Finished! pause exit _____________________________________________________________________________________________ Any ideas??

item.title: My compiler won't work need help!
item.dc:creator: @Cheeky_Bear Cheeky Bear
item.description:
@Cheeky_Bear wrote:

Do you have java installed, if not, here’s the download link;

item.title: My compiler won't work need help!
item.dc:creator: @scipyo scipyo
item.description:
@scipyo wrote:

I just made a command in my server but it wont let me compile it.
When I compile i get:

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

The code for the compiler im using is this.

@echo off
title Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Any ideas??

Read full topic
item.source: My compiler won't work need help!
